title: Invisible Probe — triage call confirms ‘PC Russell’ decoy (…93423)
notes: Decoy confirmed at triage; reversed on 2025-06-22 with consolidation to Dixon.
category: Institutional Manipulation → Sussex Police → Record falsification / Decoy deployment
public_summary: A covert 101 call used to probe the fabricated case split between PC Russell and PC Dixon. The resulting reversal four days later confirmed that Sussex Police had engineered a decoy narrative to deflect oversight. The call exposes systemic record manipulation and a deliberate attempt to mislead the IOPC.
